summary.span: 提供支持用户创建的批注的类，这些批注与 WPF 文档查看控件中显示的内容有关。

span.span: Provides classes to support user-created annotations on content displayed in WPF document viewing controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的类型提供命名空间以支持上查看控件的 Windows Presentation Foundation 文档中显示的应用程序数据的用户创建的批注的管理。Types in the namespace are provided to support the management of user-created annotations on application data displayed in Windows Presentation Foundation document viewing controls. 使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_caf](~/includes/tlasharptla-caf-md.md)]应用程序可以添加对用户创建的注释和突出显示的与应用程序文档本身分开存储支持。Using the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_caf](~/includes/tlasharptla-caf-md.md)] applications can add support for user-created notes and highlights that are stored separate from the application document itself. 由于用户批注信息与文档内容分开存储，用户甚至可以添加注释，并突出显示到只读的还是的权限管理文档不能以物理方式更改。Since the user annotation information is stored separately from the document content, users can even add notes and highlights to read-only or rights-managed documents that cannot be physically changed.
